conclusion: Identify given information: refractive index, angle of incidence, rectangle dimensions.
Apply Snell's Law at the first interface to find sin(theta_2).
Determine the angle theta_2 using inverse sine.
Calculate coordinates of point P as midpoint of AB.
Determine coordinates of point M using geometry of rectangle.
Use trigonometry to find horizontal distance x using tangent function.
Calculate vertical distance y using sine function.
Calculate length PM using distance formula.
Final calculation of PM as approximately 1.00125L.
